issue.title: [Doc] Tutorial - R bindings
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14603](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14603). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Make a simple tutorial of adding a unit test PR.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14603?focusedCommentId=17463171) by Alenka Frim (alenka):*
I will insert the reference to the content of <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11915> once the PR is closed. In the PR the tutorial for R bindings is written and this issue can be closed.

We can add additional tutorials in the V2 of the guide.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14603?focusedCommentId=17469296) by Nicola Crane (thisisnic):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12016
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12016>
